name: PAR5E
short_description:
PAR5E is a software Parser tool for creating modules and bulk loading data for FantasyGrounds II v2.9.3 or
higher role playing game rulesets.

As data content and FGII rulesets are so very tightly coupled, PAR5E has been written modularly in an
attempt to enable multiple FGII rulesets to be supported. The PAR5E tool itself does not implement any ruleset specific parsing awareness or logic; instead its ruleset extensibility is implemented through the use
of independent ruleset libraries (Perl Modules) which are dynamically linked to (at run time) providing the
specific ruleset and content parsing functions.

PAR5E is bundled with an example ruleset library for the D&D Next/5E role playing game system which
produces modules for the D&D Next/5E Fantasy Grounds II ruleset (in development) .

PAR5E is written in Perl and should run on any platform that supports Perl and the wxWidgets library.
summary: PAR5E Fantasy Grounds II RPG Module Parser
